entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:59 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
